item.description: Strings # Remove first and last quote (") from a variable # 's/^"//'replaces a leading " with nothing 's/"$//'replaces a trailing " with nothing <<< : here-string Operatorï¼Œstring as stdin (In the same invocation ,there isn’t any need to pipe and start another sed. Using -e you can have multiple text processing). opt="\"html test\"" sed -e 's/^"//' -e 's/"$//' <<<"$opt"
